d.title: Arrow functions and parentheses: "good" example in 8.2 does not follow suggestions in 8.4
Indentation of object destructuring default parameter
Arrow function IIFE parens
JSHint link in ES5 style guide is expired
d.body:
https://github.com/airbnb/javascript/tree/master/es5#resources

Hi, I wanted to download the .jshintrc file that follows airbnb style guide but the link is expired

d.title: indent rule ignoredNodes needs to include 'JSXElement'
d.body:
Currently the following is impossible to not cause as ESlint error with AirBnB rules: ```jsx const Form = ({ logo, styles }) => (
{ ... }} >
) ``` If the single `>` by itself (closing the opening `

d.title: Incorrect import/extensions settings?
d.body:
In [this commit](https://github.com/airbnb/javascript/commit/b45fdcd60f6e08f13718bc2348e8d6ea1314e91c), the settings for `import/extensions` was added but this seems incorrect. I don't see that `node_modules` is a valid entry in the doc.

https://github.com/benmosher/eslint-plugin-import#importextensions

What does it mean exactly if it's valid?

d.title: Cannot validate indentation of prop values using default eslint-airbnb-preset and eslint-plugin-react
Template string with special character are getting inappropriately converted to quoted string
d.body:
```<input placeholder={`line1\nline2`} ></input>``` gets auto fixed into 
`<input placeholder="line1\nline2" />` which treats the `\n` literally. 

Versions:
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^16.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.7.0",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.0.2",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.4.0"

d.title: Fix iterator code example error
d.body: The first "good" example was missing a closing bracket (line 1377).

d.title: React version specified as "0.15"
d.body: Currently, the eslint-plugin-react config's React version is specified as [0.15](https://github.com/airbnb/javascript/blob/master/packages/eslint-config-airbnb/rules/react.js#L330), whereas I assume it should be 15.0. Happy to PR the change if I haven't missed something.

d.title: Missing jsx-quotes rule
d.body: 52d3401f953afcf09ca64dbbb177c6284832aae6 disabled the `jsx-quotes` rule in `eslint-config-airbnb-base` (presumably because the config is intended to deal with non-React rules) but the rule didn't get re-enabled on the `eslint-config-airbnb` side.

d.title: If you don't know array length
d.body:
This section:

> If you don't know array length use Array#push.

found [here](https://github.com/airbnb/javascript#arrays) is pretty weird. You should know the array length if you have access to the reference.

We just need to clean up this wording to say use Array#push rather than arr[n]

d.title: Fix crash in ESLint invocation with TIMING env set
d.body:
Fixes https://github.com/airbnb/javascript/issues/3045

Please see the linked issue for additional context. Here's copy-pasta of the report

> In [`/whitespace.js`](https://github.com/airbnb/javascript/blob/e6080c7beed96700a599e7d86f1517bdc8269366/packages/eslint-config-airbnb/whitespace.js#L54) a subprocess is launched to print out the rules in JSON and the JSON response is parsed.

> If ESLint is being run with `TIMING=1`, it prints how much time each rule takes, and because the linked child process invocation is forwarding the env as-is, it's json parsing will fail and the process breaks down.
